item.title: Hacker School, 2014-06-20
item.dc:creator: punchagan
item.description:
• Fridays are optional in Hacker School, and people are given help with preparation for job interviews.
  • This week's exercise was a "know-your-language" type exercise and I decided to do it with Haskell, and confirmed the fact that I didn't know it too well. :)
  • I spent the afternoon writing the blog-post on OAuth2, and adding support for converting ditaa code blocks to png using Pygments. It may not have been the best use of time, but anywayâ€¦
